item.industry_mod.wire_copper.desc0:
§7Component used in cable reels to connect two points.

item.industry_mod.connection_changer.des:
§7An easy-to-use tool for changing the mode of a cable connector.

item.industry_mod.cable_roll.desc1:
§7The amount of thread is determined by the durability of the item.
